title: Where We Left Off by J. Alex Blane
description:
Some memories you do your best to forget. Others you wish you simply had the opportunity to remember. Mason Everett found himself in the center of both, as he felt the warmth of an autumn sun graze his face through the tinted windows.

A successful Real-estate developer, Mason had his picture perfect life. He was young, handsome, wealthy and single. No stranger to frequent hook ups at the local night clubs he avoided relationships at all costs living tirelessly by one rule:

Ã¢â‚¬Å“Never let anyone close enough again to hurt youÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½

Until he found himself falling for Sydney McCail, a young woman he met at his brotherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s wedding. In the midst of a developing relationship MasonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s past begins to surface causing him to push Sydney away in fear of her finding out a secret heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d kept hidden for most of his adult life. 

In the wake of a tragic accident she finds that what she thought she knew was only the beginning, and what happens from there leaves them both searching for answers to a single question in what turns out to be a startling outcome, Where We Left Off.

Genre: Romantic Suspense
